original_text: And Caleb said, “Whoever strikes Kiriath-sepher and captures it, to him will I give Achsah my daughter as wife.”
korean_text: 갈렙이 말하기를 기럇 세벨을 쳐서 그것을 점령하는 자에게는 내가 내 딸 악사를 아내로 주리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Whoever strikes Kiriath-sepher and captures it,
to him will I give Achsah my daughter as wife.”
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 딕 아그사를 아내로 그에게 주겠노라.”
